Room.Name: First Station of the Oracle
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the first of three stations in the Cathedral of Veratus.
Room.LongDescription: Veratus the Oracle often takes the form of a small owl at this first station, and will answer one question only here. If you pique her interest, you may advance to the second station, and ask another. Unfortunately, the monks here do not like you taking up her time with your questions, when they have questions of their own.
